name: Name
failed_to_sign_in_message: Failed to sign in. Please try again.
competitive_mode_description: In the competitive mode, each match against AI affects your rating. Do your best to get to the top of the ranking!
normal_mode_description: In the normal mode, you can simply enjoy a match against AI. Game results do not affect your rating.
description: Top Carcassonner is a platfrom where you can play Carcassonne against AI.
random_match_description: In this mode, you can play against a randomly matched player. At the moment, the game results do not affect your rating.
problems_description: You can consider your own move and vote in various given situations of Carcassonne, and can see what other people's moves are as well. Once you have voted, you can see all the results. New problem is published daily at 6 p.m. (JST).
propose_problem_description: You can propose a problem idea by specifying the BGA's table ID and the number of tiles remaining. The table ID is the 9-digit sequence of numbers, which immediately follows the table= in the URL. The number of remaining tiles is the number of tiles shown on the screen for the board in question.
proposal_note_placeholder: A brief description of the board would facilitate the review process. This description does not appear on the problem page.
no_problems_waiting_for_review: There is no problem waiting for review
not_authorized: You are not authorized to view this page.
thank_you_for_your_proposal: Thank you for proposing a problem idea! It may take some days for us to create and review the problem.
